parameters.name: Timeframe
parameters.description: Pick the timerange for all queries in the graph

parameters.name: _severity
parameters.description: parameter to drill down on clicked severity tile
parameters.label: severity

content.query:
datatable (Count: long, status: string, status_count: long) [0, "Low", 1, 0, "Medium", 2, 0, "High", 3, 0, "Critical", 4]
| union
    (
    CommonSecurityLog
    | where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity !contains ("saas")
    | extend status = case(    
        toint(LogSeverity) > 6, "Critical",
        toint(LogSeverity) < 3, "Low",
        toint(LogSeverity) >= 5 and toint(LogSeverity)<= 6, "High",
        toint(LogSeverity) < 5 and toint(LogSeverity) >= 3, "Medium",       
        "True"
        )
    | where status != "True"
    | extend status_count = case(status == "Critical", 4, status == "High", 3, status == "Medium", 2, 1)
    | summarize Count = count() by status, status_count
    )
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by status, status_count
| sort by status_count asc
content.title: Model Breaches By Severity

content.json: _Click on the tiles to view more details (maximum 100 entries displayed)_

content.query:
//low severity
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "Enterprise Immune System" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| where toint(LogSeverity) < 3
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "message=" Message ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "long=" Longitude ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "lat=" Latitude ";" null
| limit 100
| project  TimeGenerated, Activity, DeviceName, DeviceAddress, LogSeverity, DarktraceURL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Low Severity Model Breaches

content.query:
//medium severity
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "Enterprise Immune System" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| where toint(LogSeverity) >=3 and toint(LogSeverity) < 5
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "message=" Message ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "long=" Longitude ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "lat=" Latitude ";" null
| limit 100
| project  TimeGenerated, Activity, DeviceName, DeviceAddress, LogSeverity, DarktraceURL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Medium Severity Model Breaches

content.query:
//high severity
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "Enterprise Immune System" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| where toint(LogSeverity) >=5 and toint(LogSeverity) < 7
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "message=" Message ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "long=" Longitude ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "lat=" Latitude ";" null
| limit 100
| project  TimeGenerated, Activity, DeviceName, DeviceAddress, LogSeverity, DarktraceURL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: High Severity Model Breaches

content.query:
//critical severity
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "Enterprise Immune System" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| where toint(LogSeverity) >6
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "message=" Message ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "long=" Longitude ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "lat=" Latitude ";" null
| limit 100
| project  TimeGenerated, Activity, DeviceName, DeviceAddress, LogSeverity, DarktraceURL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

items.name: Drill down group for different severities

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range({Timeframe:start}, now(), {Timeframe:grain})
content.title: Model Breaches Over Time

content.json: _ Selecting a timeframe on the graph will change the timeframe for all queries in this tab _

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| summarize event_count=count() by Activity 
| where Activity!="System/System" 
| top 10 by event_count
content.title: Top 10 Most Breached Models

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| where isnotempty(DestinationHostName) 
| summarize count(Activity) by DestinationHostName
content.title: Top External Hostnames

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| where isnotempty(DeviceName) 
| where DeviceName !contains("#")
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| extend Severity = toint(LogSeverity)
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, DeviceName, DeviceAddress, Severity, DarktraceURL
| top 10 by toint(Severity) desc
content.title: Top 10 Devices By Severity

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity !contains ("saas")
| where isnotempty(DeviceName) 
| where DeviceName contains '#'
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| top 10 by toint(LogSeverity) desc 
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, DeviceName, DeviceAddress, toint(LogSeverity), DarktraceURL
content.title: Top 10 C-Sensor activities

content.query: CommonSecurityLog | where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" | where isnotempty(DestinationIP) | where DestinationIP !startswith "10"| where DestinationIP !startswith "192"| where DestinationIP !startswith "172"| summarize event_count=count() by DestinationIP | top 10 by event_count
content.title: Top 10 External IPs

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog | where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" 
| where Activity contains "Compliance"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range({Timeframe:start}, now(), {Timeframe:grain})
content.title: Compliance Breaches Over Time

datatable (Count: long, status: string, status_count: long) [0, "Low", 1, 0, "Medium", 2, 0, "High", 3, 0, "Critical", 4]
| union
    (
    CommonSecurityLog
    | where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity contains "saas"
    | extend status = case(    
        toint(LogSeverity) > 6, "Critical",

| summarize Count=sum(Count) by status, status_count

content.title: Compliance Breaches Over Time

content.query:
let AIAnalystAlerts =
  CommonSecurityLog
  | where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "AI Analyst"
  | extend status = case(    
    toint(LogSeverity) > 6, "Critical",
    toint(LogSeverity) < 3, "Low",
    toint(LogSeverity) >= 5 and toint(LogSeverity)<= 6, "High",
    toint(LogSeverity) < 5 and toint(LogSeverity) >= 3, "Medium",       
    "True"
  )
  | sort by TimeGenerated asc;
union (
  AIAnalystAlerts
  | parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupByActivity=" GroupByActivity ";" null
  | where GroupByActivity == 0
  | parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupingId=" GroupingID ";" null
  | extend d = pack("Activity", Activity, "TimeGenerated", TimeGenerated, "status", status, "DeviceName", DeviceName, "DeviceAddress", DeviceAddress, "GroupByActivity", GroupByActivity)
  | summarize status = make_list(d)[0].status, Left = iff(make_list(d)[0].DeviceName != "", make_list(d)[0].DeviceName, make_list(d)[0].DeviceAddress), TimeGenerated = todatetime(make_list(d)[0].TimeGenerated), list = make_list(d), GroupByActivity = make_list(d)[0].GroupByActivity by GroupingID
  | extend FirstActivity = list[0].Activity
  | extend SecondActivity = iff(FirstActivity != "" and list[1].Activity != "", strcat(", ", list[1].Activity), "")
  | extend ThirdActivity = iff(FirstActivity != "" and SecondActivity != "" and list[2].Activity != "", strcat(", ", list[2].Activity), "")
  | extend Right = strcat(FirstActivity, SecondActivity, ThirdActivity, iff(ThirdActivity != "", "...", ""))
  | extend showGroupBy = GroupingID
), (
  AIAnalystAlerts
  | parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupByActivity=" GroupByActivity ";" null
  | where GroupByActivity == 1
  | extend d = pack("Activity", Activity, "TimeGenerated", TimeGenerated, "status", status, "DeviceName", DeviceName, "DeviceAddress", DeviceAddress, "ActivityID", DeviceEventClassID, "GroupByActivity", GroupByActivity)
  | summarize status = make_list(d)[0].status, Left = make_list(d)[0].Activity, Devices = make_list(d), TimeGenerated = todatetime(make_list(d)[0].TimeGenerated), list = make_list(d), GroupByActivity = make_list(d)[0].GroupByActivity by DeviceEventClassID
  | extend FirstDevice = iff(list[0].DeviceName != "", list[0].DeviceName, list[0].DeviceAddress)
  | extend SecondDeviceName = iff(list[1].DeviceName != "", list[1].DeviceName, list[1].DeviceAddress)
  | extend SecondDevice = iff(FirstDevice != "" and SecondDeviceName != "", strcat(", ", SecondDeviceName), "")
  | extend ThirdDeviceName = iff(list[2].DeviceName != "", list[2].DeviceName, list[2].DeviceAddress)
  | extend ThirdDevice = iff(FirstDevice != "" and SecondDevice != "" and ThirdDeviceName != "", strcat(", ", ThirdDeviceName), "")
  | extend Right = strcat(FirstDevice, SecondDevice, ThirdDevice, iff(ThirdDevice != "", "...", ""))
  | extend showGroupBy = DeviceEventClassID
  | extend showGroupByActivity = 1
)
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: AI Analyst Incidents

content.json: _ Click on an incident to see related incidents _

content.query:
(CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "AI Analyst"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupingId=" GroupingID ";" null
| where DeviceEventClassID == '{groupingID}'
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| extend id = split(tostring(DarktraceURL), '#aiincident/')[1]
| extend d = pack_array(id)
| extend p = pack("GroupingID", GroupingID)
| summarize packed = make_list(d), GroupingID = make_list(p)[0].GroupingID
| extend ids = strcat_array(packed, ',')
| project GroupingID = tostring(GroupingID), ids)
| join (
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "AI Analyst"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupingId=" GroupingID ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "message=" Message ";" null
| where DeviceEventClassID == '{groupingID}'
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| extend url = split(tostring(DarktraceURL), '#aiincident/')[0]
| extend Device = iff(DeviceName != "", DeviceName, DeviceAddress)
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, Device, Message, LogSeverity, GroupingID = tostring(GroupingID), url = tostring(url)
) on GroupingID
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, Device, Message, LogSeverity, DarktraceURL = strcat(url, '#aiincident/', ids)
content.title: Related Incidents

content.query:
(CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "AI Analyst"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupingId=" GroupingID ";" null
| where GroupingID == '{groupingID}'
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| extend id = split(tostring(DarktraceURL), '#aiincident/')[1]
| extend d = pack_array(id)
| extend p = pack("GroupingID", GroupingID)
| summarize packed = make_list(d), GroupingID = make_list(p)[0].GroupingID
| extend ids = strcat_array(packed, ',')
| project GroupingID = tostring(GroupingID), ids)
| join (
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "AI Analyst"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupingId=" GroupingID ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "message=" Message ";" null
| where GroupingID == '{groupingID}'
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| extend url = split(tostring(DarktraceURL), '#aiincident/')[0]
| extend Device = iff(DeviceName != "", DeviceName, DeviceAddress)
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, Device, Message, LogSeverity, GroupingID = tostring(GroupingID), url = tostring(url)
) on GroupingID
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, Device, Message, LogSeverity, DarktraceURL = strcat(url, '#aiincident/', ids)
content.title: Related Incidents

CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "AI Analyst"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range({Timeframe:start}, now(), {Timeframe:grain})

| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and DeviceProduct == "AI Analyst"
| summarize event_count=count() by Activity 
| where Activity!="System/System" 
| top 10 by event_count
content.title: Top 10 Most Frequent Incidents

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Darktrace" and Activity contains "Antigena"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "groupByActivity=" GroupByActivity ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "darktraceUrl=" DarktraceURL ";" null
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "message=" Message_s ";" null
| extend Device = iff(DeviceName != "", DeviceName, DeviceAddress)
| extend agnActivity = split(Activity, "/")[2]
| extend arr = split(Message_s,"/")
| extend msgInfo = arr[(array_length(arr)-1)]
